name: Factorysation (mnjq2006)
description:
Factorysation is a base building game based around the automation of resource gathering. Go from starting with nothing at all and having to do everything yourself to having all resources automated and collected for you. 

As an engineer researching about time and space travel, you accidentally travel to an unknown time period where the city you once lived in has become a forest. Unfortunately, the Time Shard you used was too fragile and shattered, leaving you stranded in the unfamiliar environment. You start your journey of collecting resources in order to gather the right ingredients to make another Time Shard to travel back home. 

CONTROLS:

Move - WASD

Mine/Break - RMB

Interact - LMB

Open Inventory - E

Close - Esc

Pick Up - LShift

Drop - Q

Enter/Exit - F
